channel.title: Help so we can take over the world!
channel.description:
Hint: NAME ;) Hi
There is this new game, text-based which is country simulation game based on risk and civilization.
Basically you can do the following in it: Search for a job, work, start a company, start a political party, participate in votings, start a newspaper, start a bank, start different organizations, forums, WAR
I have a bunch of people from moparisthebest in the game so now I need a lot more from moparscape, ARE YOU IN?
We are now all in Iran, and we are going to start in middle of Asia to attack everyone.
Put your email here and PM me, as soon as invites work again (probably tomorrow) i'll invite you.
WE ARE GOING TO MAKE THE BIGGEST ARMY IN THIS GAME (the strongest army is Sweden with 3000 soldiers) WE ARE AROUD 400 SOLDIERS
SO JOIN
INSTRUCTIONS ON WHAT TO DO WHEN YOU'RE IN: FIRST: REMEMBER TO PICK COUNTRY (IRAN) IT'S THE COUTRY YOU WANT TO PLAY IN AND NOT THE ONE YOU LIVE IN second: As soon as you register, put your CV up (Go to Economy -> Find a job) just write random crap third: join Pasargad political party.. (Politics -> Join a party) fourth: Make a newspaper that is pro-Pasargad and pro-Koroush (current President of Iran) five: TRAIN TRAIN TRAIN TRAIN TRAIN TRAIN TRAIN (go to MIlitary -> Train) SIXTH: Accept job from no one but Koroush, put up your name here to get hired and get into cool guys club
WELCOME!!!!!!!!!!!! regards, xerxes
(if you get a invite, and don't join Iran, then I will go fag on you and I will kick you in the ass wherever I can [b]FOREVER[/b]) if i get banned, well, then get on irc.. #l0l instead of #mopar and ask for invites.
[size=15pt]WHEN YOU REGISTER; PICK IRAN! IT ASKS FOR THE COUNTRY YOU WANT TO JOIN, NOT THE ONE YOU LIVE IN![/size]

item.title: Help so we can take over the world!
item.description:
@_58_65_72_78_65_73 wrote:

NEED MORE PEOPLE! COME ON GUIZ.

I put the current emails on the list to be invited as soon as invites are back up.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 03, 2008, 04:55:58 PM[/size][hr][quote=“XxKanexX, post:238, topic:182930”]Long time no speak, Xerxes.
I guess i could play from time to time.

If, that is, you don’t still hate me.

three_plus_three_is_six@hotmail.com

So, what exactly happens?
Information will get sent to that email on how to join, or what?[/quote]

OK; You should be getting invite soon. Check your spam/junk folder because that’s where it goes for hotmail

Remember to register in Iran, pick country Iran.

Also, you will get 2 invites, so invite two of these:
ThAt0n36Uy@gmail.com
leighlawley@hotmail.co.uk
dominicwilliams92@hotmail.com

The one you invite can invite the other one, Alright? We clear

PICK IRAN
PUT UP USERNAME FOR INSTRUCTIONS!

Read full topic
